programme.desc: Blanche learns that her brother is gay after he claims to have slept with Rose.

programme.title: Royal Hearts
programme.desc: Montana rancher Hank learns that he's the last heir of the late King of Merania and has inherited the throne. His daughter Kelly convinces the reluctant royal to step in as king so the country can keep its independence.

programme.title: Tulips in Spring
programme.desc: When a young interior designer learns her father has broken his leg, she rushes home to rural Washington because her help is desperately needed at the family tulip farm.

programme.title: Destination Wedding
programme.desc: Ellie has been painstakingly planning her sister Mandy's destination wedding for a very long time. When Mandy and her fiance don't show up, Ellie and her ex-boyfriend find themselves reconnecting while frantically trying to prevent a disaster.

programme.title: Harvest Love
programme.desc: A widowed surgeon visits her family's pear orchard in hopes of taking a break from her hectic life and reconnecting with her distant son. Once there, she begins to fall for the farm manager, Will, who is growing a new hybrid pear.

programme.title: Falling for Vermont
programme.desc: A best-selling author who got amnesia as the result of a car accident finds refuge with the local doctor of a small idyllic town in Vermont.

programme.title: The Motherhood
programme.desc: Space enthusiast Danielle has created a joyful life for her daughter Lucy, but lost sight of her own dreams along the way; with support from Connie Britton and the experts, she learns to accept help and reignite her passions.

programme.title: An Unexpected Valentine
programme.desc: A chance encounter on Valentine's Day brings Hannah and Finn together as they race through New York City to return a lost engagement ring and save one couple's special day.

programme.desc: Carla consults a psychic (Georgia Brown) concerning her late husband's attempts to contact her from beyond.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: After Brock and Barbra Jean get audited, Brock informs Reba that the IRS is going to audit the last five years of their marriage.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Embarrassed Brock believes the only way he can pay off his back taxes is to sell his house and move to Las Vegas.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Dr. Jack Morgan returns to Houston with the intention of resuming his romance with Reba, despite the fact that he is still married.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba advises Van to treat Cheyenne as an equal in the family budget, which prompts him to give her an allowance.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: The roommates buy a dying artist's painting, hoping to sell it for a profit.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche has reservations about dating a blind man, since he cannot see her physical attributes; Dorothy and Rose coach a children's team.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose feels inadequate when her new boyfriend experiences impotency.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia disapproves of the man Dorothy is dating; Blanche and Rose befriend juvenile delinquents.

programme.title: Once Upon a Prince
programme.desc: Susanna accepts help one day from Nate at her parents' store in Georgia. Sparks between them fly, but when a photo of them gets leaked to the press, Susanna is in for the shock of her life when Nate is called back home for his coronation as a king.

programme.title: The Secret Ingredient
programme.desc: A small-town baker reunites with her ex-fiance after traveling to New York City to compete on a Valentine's Day cooking show.

programme.title: Easter Under Wraps
programme.desc: A woman goes under cover at her family's chocolate factory to find out why sales are down and meets the head chocolatier, who has new ideas for Easter products.

programme.title: An Easter Bloom
programme.desc: A young gardener enters an Easter floral competition to save her family farm. Along the way, she meets a local pastor who helps restore her lost hope.

programme.title: A Greek Recipe for Romance
programme.desc: While visiting her mother in Greece, Abby decides to open a restaurant with a man she just met.

programme.title: Falling Together
programme.desc: Natalie tries to bring feuding neighbors together in her new condo building. Her unexpected ally is the building's super who prefers to avoid getting involved.
